title: Elegant Diamond-studded Kadas: Vala Set for the Modern Bride
features: Modern openable Kada bangle design. Sleek, minimalist form adorned with brilliant-cut diamonds set in a prong setting. Subtle curve provides comfortable wear. Polished to a high shine for maximum luster. The flexible opening makes them easy to wear. The diamonds are placed in such a way that it looks like each diamond is floating.
occasions: Perfect for pre-wedding ceremonies like Pellikuthuru
or contemporary festive occasions. Also suitable for daily wear
adding a touch of luxury to your everyday look.
description: A contemporary twist on traditional Indian bangles (Valalu), crafted with exceptional gold purity and ethically sourced diamonds. These Kadas are not just beautiful; they are a statement of modern elegance. Their lightweight design ensures comfortable all-day wear. Perfect as an heirloom piece to be passed down through generations.
